text: MADI / AES / Intercom 2 x MADI/AES and 4 x Intercom Ethernet / Serial / GPIO 4 x 1GE Ethernet Tunneling, 16 x GPI/GPO, 4 x Serial, 2 x 10G SFP 3G–SDI with J2K 12 x J2K Encode or Decode Full Test Generator Built–in Test Code Generator for signal veriﬁcation evRemote Smart Remote–at–Home Production Link Monitoring Built–in link tests with performance measurements Multiviewer Multiview of up to 8 signals at any given time 120 Gbps Switching Capacity 12x JPEG2000 Encoder/r Decoder MADI AES Intercom www.evertz.com | @EvertzTV North / South America: +1-877-995-3700 | sales@evertz.com | UK: +44 (0)118-921-6800 | UKSales@evertz.com Europe: +385 91-4949-333 | SEEuropeSales@evertz.com | Middle East & Africa: +971 4-422-9113 | MiddleEastSales@evertz.com Asia: +852 2850-7989 | AsiaPaciﬁcSales@evertz.com | Australia & New Zealand: +61 431-290-409 | AustraliaSales@evertz.com Evertz is a proud member of the following groups: evRemote Features • Main and Redundant 10G/1G Trunks with Built–in Link Tests and jitter performance with Inband management • Internal Switching Capacity of over 120 Gbps • Full video/audio multiview of up to 8 signals at any given time • Video — Up to 12 x J2K Encode or Decode • Audio — 2 x MADI/AES and 4 x Intercom • Other — 4 x 1GE Ethernet Tunneling, 16 x GPI/GPO, 4 x Serial, 2 x 10G SFP • Simple setup and deployment • Control at the touch of your ﬁngers • IP Encapsulation Supports: SMPTE RDD37 (ASPEN), TR-03, SMPTE 2022, SMPTE 2110 (Future Standard) • MAGNUM / VistaLINK PRO / inSITE / VUE • Full Evertz control panel support Applications Camera Stadium Master Control Mobile Truck Router Tape Deck Audio Video Data IP
